h2_title: Yaksha King Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Yaksha King
Yaksha King is one of the Yaoguai Kings you'll need to fight at the end of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. He's the final boss of the Chapter, so expect a challenging fight.
## Yaksha King Boss Fight and Guide

img_summary: The image depicts the Yaksha King, a formidable and grotesque creature with demonic features, including horns and a muscular, scarred body. This character is the final boss of Chapter 5 in the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The image serves to visually introduce players to the Yaksha King, emphasizing the challenging nature of the upcoming boss fight. The dark and ominous background, along with the creature's menacing appearance, sets the tone for the intense battle described in the guide.
